findings.rationale: Two years may not be sufficient for certain types of confidential information, potentially exposing the parties to risks of information leakage after the period ends.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidentiality obligations shall continue for two (2) years after termination of discussions.

findings.risk_title: Lack of Specificity in Confidential Information Definition
findings.rationale: The broad definition may lead to misunderstandings about what constitutes confidential information, increasing the likelihood of disputes.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidential Information means all proprietary information disclosed by one party to the other.

findings.rationale: The clause lacks detail on how the return or destruction of confidential information will be verified, which may lead to compliance issues.
findings.evidence_quote: Return or destroy all Confidential Information upon request.
